creditline: Gift of Mrs. George P. Douglas
markings: Numerous pencil inscriptions. Upper left corner: 952, 8 p., Rto. 3 m.m [This drawing was made for the Centruy Co. by Jos. Pennell, E.H. Whittle] followed by 3 unreadable words. Lower edge, left to right : [black & white marble,] [tailpiece Cathedral Lucca,] 10, VI 6th. In black ink along top left edge: [a5497]. Smudge of black ink in lower right corner. Verso: In black crayon & circled [- Glu, a476]. Within the circle are the D-douglas collectors mark & stamped in violet ink: [ART DEPARTMENT THE CENTURY CO:, UNION SQUARE NEW YORK CITY.] Upper left corner in pencil [OHL], lower right [30-890] and [J= ]
medium: Pen and black ink on paper
title: Tailpiece: Designs for the marble at Lucca Cathedral
